entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
